amendment.description: To provide additional funding for intercity passenger rail transportation, freight rail, and mass transit.

action.text: Amendment SA 1218 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Byrd.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1218.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1218 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 184.
Amendment SA 1218 ruled out of order by the chair.
